channel.title: Markdown on re:current_analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on re:current_analytics

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section. Write an R package. Write a book. … Profit! Similarly, Blackfriday does not support LaTeX math and Pandoc does. I have added the MathJax support to this theme (hugo-xmin) but there is a caveat for plain Markdown posts: you have to include math expressions in a pair of backticks (inline: `$ $`; display style: `$$ $$`), e.
